metadata.summary: In this episode of the Joe Rogan Experience, comedians Luis J. Gomez and Big Jay Oakerson engage in a wide-ranging conversation with Joe Rogan. They delve into personal health, discussing supplements like creatine and the potential downsides of testosterone use. The conversation shifts to technology, with opinions on electric cars and their limitations. The comedians share humorous anecdotes and observations on various topics, including the challenges of stand-up comedy, the impact of social media, and the complexities of political discourse. They also touch on controversial subjects like law enforcement, historical revisionism, and the evolution of comedy in the age of podcasting.

localized.description:
Luis J. Gomez is a comic, writer, and producer. He co-hosts several podcasts, including “Legion of Skanks,” “The Regz,” “Story Warz,” and “Real Ass Podcast.” You can watch his most recent special, “30 Minutes with Luis J. Gomez,” on YouTube.
⁠https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KB1LwYbYq6U&t=2s⁠
⁠https://www.luisofskanks.com⁠

Big Jay Oakerson is a stand-up comedian, podcaster, and on-air personality. He co-hosts "The Legion of Skanks," "Story Warz," and "The Bonfire."  His new crowd work specials, "Them" & "They" are now available on YouTube.
⁠https://www.bigjaycomedy.com⁠
⁠https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T12MMZ69Z2Y⁠
